content: By now you may have noticed the New Thunderclap Temple is brimming with lots of enemies you don't necessarily need to kill. Between the praying Censor Holders and blind Overseeing Monks, you can ignore a lot of enemies if you wish, but it's also not a bad idea to kill them for extra Will and Experience, and is also a good way to build up Focus to expend on more deadly foes.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
By now you may have noticed the New Thunderclap Temple is brimming with lots of enemies you don't necessarily need to kill. Between the praying Censor Holders and blind Overseeing Monks, you can ignore a lot of enemies if you wish, but it's also not a bad idea to kill them for extra Will and Experience, and is also a good way to build up Focus to expend on more deadly foes.
